```sql
SELECT name
FROM employees
WHERE name IN (
    SELECT name
    FROM employees
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM employees e2
        WHERE e2.name LIKE e1.name || '%'
    ) DESC
    LIMIT 1
)
```
